means: 不能原谅的，未经允许的

sentence.Network_en: No point credit will be given for unexcused lateness exceeding 5 days.
sentence.Network_cn: 迟交作业超过5天将不可原谅,不会给予分数.

sentence.Network_en: Section attendance is mandatory. Unexcused absence from section will be penalized.
sentence.Network_cn: 本课属强制性出席, 无故缺席者将受惩罚.

sentence.Network_en: Students with more than four unexcused absences shall be from the class.
sentence.Network_cn: 超过四次无故缺席,该生就必须退选这门课.

PerfectNetExp.abs: too many unexcused absences ., 太多未经允许的缺席.

list.abs: More than two unexcused absences will seriously jeopardize your class participation grade ., 超过两次无故缺课将严重危及你的课堂参与评分.
too many unexcused absences ., 太多未经允许的缺席.
If you have more than two unexcused absences , will affect your final grade ., 如果有两次无故缺席 , 将会影响你们期末的成绩.
The principal discouraged unexcused absences ., 校长不准无故缺课.
